original_title: The Farallon Islands: Past, Present, and Future
overview: Twenty-five miles west of San Francisco lies a group of islands that few residents of the City even know about. Yet, the Farallon Islands are a true wilderness area, and the number and variety of wildlife on and around these islands is nothing short of extraordinary. This film offers a behind-the-scenes look at these islands, and the vast wildlife that found there.
title: The Farallon Islands: Past, Present, and Future
